name: evista-starter-theme-sass
description: Evista Starter Theme with Sass for Wordpress

scripts.watch: set WPTHEME=evista-starter-theme-sass && npm rebuild node-sass && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build: set WPTHEME=evista-starter-theme-sass && npm rebuild node-sass && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --optimize-minimize --config webpack.production.config.js

author: Schutzbach Zsolt <schutzbach.zsolt@e-vista.hu>
